column4: W High St at Madison Pl
column5: The roadway is shutdown until further notice due to an earlier serious collision.

column4: Starting Monday 5/10 on W Short St at N Mill St and N Upper St.
Signals will be flashing red All-Way stops from 7 p.m. to 6 a.m. each evening.
Signals will be normal Red-Yellow-Green at all other times.
